original_text: These are the stages of the people of Israel, when they went out of the land of Egypt by their companies under the leadership of Moses and Aaron.
korean_text: 모세와 아론의 인도로 대오를 갖추어 애굽을 떠난 이스라엘 자손들의 노정은 이러하니라

sentences.original_text: These are the stages of the people of Israel
when they went out of the land of Egypt
under the leadership of Moses and Aaron
